author: wn.com
title: Last Chance to See LAVC Theater Arts' Production of the Cripple of Inishmaan (Los Angeles ...
text: ( Source : Los Angeles Valley College ) The final performance of the LAVC Theater Arts Department 's production Martin McDonagh 's The Cripple of the Inishmaan will take place on October 25 at 2 p.m. in the Horseshoe Theater in the Theater Arts
